author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR suggests a small restructuring of the package `RecoPixelVertexing/PixelVertexFinding`.
I was trying to use the `PVClusterComparer` class in a separate CMSSW (user-)package,
but realized I couldn't do it without modifying the file `RecoPixelVertexing/PixelVertexFinding/BuildFile.xml` (adding the `export` directive).
While looking into this, I noticed `src/` contained both standalone classes and plugins, so I moved the latter ones under `plugins/` (and removed the file `src/SealModules.cc`),
as suggested in the [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html).

These changes are purely technical; no differences in the comparisons are expected.

#### PR validation:

Successfully ran a few standard workflows (for example, `runTheMatrix.py -l 11634.0`).

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Not a backport, and no backport of this is planned.
title: [RecoPixelVertexing/PixelVertexFinding] updated BuildFile.xml and added plugins/
